attributes.additional_details:
Pass a BRITISH law to Legalise the Cultivation,use,sell of Cannabis.

As there is NO British laws on this matter.
In Response to this your going to reply , The misuse of drugs act 1971.

Well to the best of my Knowledge I believe the above is a Treaty and NOT law. ("Also no uk court or government has to follow any treaty made by the EU so it's a load of False lies")

Plus the moment the government Decided to join the EU they Committed an act of Treason!

So in Response to all of the above I Suggest making a BRITISH law to Legalise the Cultivation,use,sell of Cannabis.
